## Installation

You can install the released version of graphstats from [this repository](https://forgemia.inra.fr/etienne.rifa/graphstats) with:

``` {r install, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_gitlab(repo = "etienne.rifa/graphstats", auth_token = 'LgkWC8oPN7aq8bXZ8Cto', host = "forgemia.inra.fr")

```

## To run Shiny app

```{r run, eval = FALSE}
library(graphstats)
graphstats::run_app()
```
